summary: The true story of a group of Cambridge University Students who are recruited to spy for the Soviet Union in the early 1930s.
cast: Tom Hollander|Toby Stephens|Rupert Penry-Jones|Samuel West|Stuart Laing|Darrell D'Silva|Anna-Louise Plowman|Ronald Pickup|Marcel Iures|Angus Wright|Patrick Kennedy|Colin Higgins|John Light|Imelda Staunton|Ben Meyjes|Michael Parkhouse|Jenna Harrison|Miles Richardson|Ian Shaw|David Savile|Simon Woods|Daniel Hart|Lucy Russell|James Fox|Alejandra Herzberg|Adam Blackwood|Nicholas Day|Peter Eyre|Simon Jones|Martin McDougall|Nicholas Burns|Garrick Hagon|Simon Masterton Smith|Charles Cartmell|Julian Firth|Lisa Dillon|Kate Ford|Annabel Mullion|Anthony Andrews|Matthew Bell|Emma Davies|Leon Lissek|Jonathan Burn|John Warnaby|Alastair Galbraith|John Guerrasio|Geoffrey Harris|Philip Anthony|Nancy Crane|Boris Isarov|Kathryn Akin|Mark Shivas|Lee Colley|Gillian Goodman|Thaddeus Small|Jeanne Hepple|Joe Searby|Michelle Newell|Benedict Cumberbatch|Freddie Stevenson|Nancy Carroll|Mireia Rojo|Manuel Munoz|Alberto Martin Alvarez|Christopher James|Mary Jo Randle|Christiane Spivey|Hazel Holder|John Warman|Jos Man|Sam York

title: Espías de Cambridge
